actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend section 5584 of title 5, United States Code, to include claims for overpayments of pay and allowances to employees of the Government Printing Office.

summary.text: Includes claims for overpayments of pay and allowances to employees of the Government Printing Office among those claims which may be waived in whole or in part by the United States. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 5584)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5584 of title 5, United States Code, to include claims for overpayments of pay and allowances to employees of the Government Printing Office.
